hero.title: Full-Stack Developer
hero.description: Developer with experience in creating modern web applications using Python, Django, and React. I specialize in building scalable solutions and performance optimization.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm a Full-Stack developer with experience in creating modern web applications. I specialize in backend development using Python and Django, as well as frontend with React and TypeScript.
about.paragraph2: My experience includes developing scalable systems, database optimization, integration with external APIs, and creating intuitive user interfaces.
